verbs.description: [ARG0: Twenty - nine European Union ambassadors to the U.S.] [V: sent] [ARG1: an open letter] [ARG2: to Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: via The Washington Post] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-PRD: criticizing him for his trade policies] .
Twenty - nine European Union ambassadors to the U.S. sent an open letter to Donald Trump via The Washington Post on Friday [V: criticizing] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: for his trade policies] .
